name: Aquametsis
description:
Inspired by classics like Deus Ex, System Shock and X-COM: UFO Defense, Aquametsis is a IMMERSIVE SIM / MANAGEMENT hybrid, set in a post-post-apocalyptic world where all the ice sheets are melted. Currently in early stages of development.

  • Play as a CEO and manage your private company by hiring mercenaries and sending them on missions, fabricating equipment, sending cargo around the world etc.
  • Control the mercenaries on missions, complete objectives and earn cash to bankroll your company.
